mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS strain_id, p.id AS products_id, s.strain_international_no AS strain_international_no, p.products_name_zh AS products_name_zh FROM dms_bacteria_strain s, dms_bacteria_products p, dms_bacteria_relations_strain_products r WHERE s.id = r.strain_id AND p.id = r.products_id

SELECT s.id AS strain_id, p.id AS products_id, s.strain_international_no AS strain_international_no, p.products_name_zh AS products_name_zh FROM dms_bacteria_strain s, dms_bacteria_products p, dms_bacteria_relations_strain_products r WHERE s.id = r.strain_id AND p.id = r.products_id AND (p.products_name_zh LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%") OR s.strain_international_no LIKE concat("%",#{keyword},"%"))
